meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> hit not one, but <radical>TWO</radical> <radical>prison</radical>s, making them extremely <kanji>dirty</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: What's the most <kanji>dirty</kanji> are the prisons' <reading>o</reading>bi (お) collections. You can hear the prisoners crying, "Oh, not the obi. Our obi are all dirty, oh no!"
